tool_description: Validates and standardizes waypoint data including coordinates, addresses, and metadata to ensure route calculation accuracy.

waypoints.description: Array of waypoint identifiers or names to validate

validation_level.description: Validation strictness: basic, standard, or strict

error_messages: Empty waypoints array: Provide at least one waypoint to validate.
Invalid validation level: Use basic, standard, or strict.
Waypoint limit exceeded: Maximum 50 waypoints allowed per validation request.
Invalid waypoint format: Waypoints must be non-empty strings.
usage: Provide an array of waypoint identifiers and optionally specify validation level. Returns validated waypoint data with status indicators.

valid_waypoints.description: Array of successfully validated waypoint identifiers

invalid_waypoints.description: Array of waypoints that failed validation

validation_summary.description: Summary of validation results and any issues found
